titles: A supplication to Eldertonne, for Leaches vnlewdnes desiring him to pardone, his manifest vnrudenes.
author: Fulwood, William.
publisher: At the long shop adioining vnto Saint Mildreds Church in the Pultry by Iohn Alde,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Elderton, William, d. 1592? --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
